text: Chantal Anne Akerman (; 6 June 1950 - 5 October 2015) was a Belgian movie director, artist, and professor at the City College of New York. Her best- known movies were Jeanne Dielman, 23 quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles (1975). Akerman was born to Jewish parents in Brussels.Guardian obituary She was a lesbian.Rare docs on French filmmakers She died on 5 October 2015 in Paris. Le Monde reported that she died by suicide after suffering from depression.
